response.original_title: Tiger Moth Tales - Live at the Boerderij
response.overview: White Knight Records are proud to announce a new Tiger Moth Tales release 'Inside The Cocoon'. To accompany the ten year anniversary release of Cocoon, we present this CD/DVD set of previously unreleased material which is a must for all Tiger Moth Tales fans. The CD contains an audio documentary, produced by Pete Jones. It includes behind the scenes audio from Cocoon's creation, and previously unreleased live tracks. It has a running time of 77 minutes. The DVD contains a live Tiger Moth Tales acoustic performance which was filmed at the Boerderij, Netherlands in 2024. Pete performs a selection of both Tiger Moth Tales and Genesis songs. Also included is an interview, in which Pete talks about Cocoon and what has happened since the album's original release. It also features a video for the new track, 'Return to Chigwick'.  Turn It on Again Feels Alright Dancing with the Moonlit Knight The Carpet Crawlers The Lock Keeper We'll Remember Harold the Barrel Ripples Still Alive
response.title: Tiger Moth Tales - Live at the Boerderij
